!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of the Seeker* is only given to those who pass the Trial of the Seeker. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. And to take the Trial of the Seeker, visit *Master Dufner of Giran Castle Town*. The *Mark of Fate* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Fate. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the Testimony of Fate, go to *Giran Castle Town and meet Dark Elven Magister Kaira*. And finally the *Mark of the Sagittarius* is only given to those who pass the Test of the Sagittarius. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of the Sagittarius, visit *Union President Bernard at the Hunters' Village*. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30474/17.htm|Return]Â
